title: Spoon, 1985-103-244, ca. 1600–1700
markings: On handle: Coat of Arms of Amsterdam, I , Amsterdam, 1598 ; Goblet: unidentified maker's mark, 1597 see: Voet, Elias Jr., MERKEN VAN AMSTERDAMSE GOUD EN ZILVERSMEDEN, Den Haag, 1912/66
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Large fig-shaped spoon-bowl. Flat flaring neck, on front scrolled decoration with lion's head in the centre, long plain neck, round in section. On top of handle a soldier standing on a pedestal holding a rifle.
